Data model¶

A module containing the classes necessary for route simulation.

Module author: Sjoerd van der Spoel <s.j.vanderspoel@utwente.nl>

Module author: Andrej Dobrkovic <a.dobrkovic@utwente.nl>

class routesimulation.model.Edge(start, end)¶

A directed edge between two points

Parameters:
  • start (model.Point) – Starting point of the edge
  • end (model.Point) – End point of the edge.
bearing()¶

Gives the bearing of this Edge from start to end in radians

Returns:float – The Edge bearing in radians
length()¶

Gives the length of this Edge in meters, i.e. the Haversine distance between its start and end points

Returns:float – The length of this Edge in meters
pointAtDistance(distance, R=6378137)¶

Gives a model.Point on this Edge at the specified distance from start

Parameters:
  • distance (float) – The distance in meters from the start of the edge
  • R (float) – The circumference of the Earth at the coordinates of the edge.
Returns:

model.Point – A Point p on this Edge such that p.distanceTo(self.start)==distance. If distance is greater than self.length(), returns self.end.
class routesimulation.model.Graph(edges)¶

A Graph of Edges

Parameters:edges (list) – A list of edges
length(start, end)¶

Determine the length of the Edge between start and end

Parameters:
  • start (model.Point) – A start point
  • end (model.Point) – An end point
Returns:

float – Length of the shortest edge if start and end are on an edge in this Graph, or None otherwise.
updateNodes()¶

Determine what the nodes are of this Graph.

This method should be called after changing the Graph’s list of edges

class routesimulation.model.Point(lon, lat)¶

A point in two-dimensional space

Parameters:
  • lon (float) – Longitude (x)
  • lat (float) – Latitude (y)
degreeRadianConversion(degreesToRadians=True)¶

Create a copy of this Point converted to degrees (range -180:180) or radians (range -pi:pi)

Parameters:degreesToRadians (bool) – If True, create a copy with radians assuming this point uses degrees, or vice versa otherwise.
Returns:model.Point–A converted Point copy
distanceTo(other, R=6378137)¶

Calculate the Haversine distance between this Point and another Point

Parameters:
  • other (model.Point) – The other Point
  • R (float) – The circumference of the Earth at the coordinates of this point.
Returns:

float – The distance in meters
east(distance)¶

Create a Point at the specified distance due east of this Point

Parameters:distance (float) – Distance in meters
Returns:model.Point – A Point east of this point
fromCartesian(vector, R=6378137)¶

Create a two-dimensional Point from a point in Cartesian space

Parameters:
  • vector (list) – x, y and z coordinates of a point in Cartesian space
  • R (float) – The circumference of the Earth at the coordinates of this point.
Returns:

model.Point – A Point in two-dimensional space
latitude()¶

The latitude (y-axis) of this Point

Returns:float – The Point latitude
longitude()¶

The longitude (x-axis) of this Point

Returns:float – The Point longitude
north(distance)¶

Create a Point at the specified distance due north of this Point

Parameters:distance (float) – Distance in meters
Returns:model.Point – A Point north of this point
pointAtDistance(distance, bearing, R=6378137)¶

Create a Point at a specified distance and bearing from this Point

Parameters:
  • distance (float) – Distance in meters
  • bearing (float) – Bearing in radians
  • R (float) – The circumference of the Earth at the coordinates of this point.
Returns:

model.Point – A Point at the specified distance and bearing from this Point
south(distance)¶

Create a Point at the specified distance due sourth of this Point

Parameters:distance (float) – Distance in meters
Returns:model.Point – A Point south of this point
toCartesian(R=6378137)¶

Calculate the position of this Point in Cartesian space

Parameters:R (float) – The circumference of the Earth at the coordinates of this point.
Returns:list – x, y, and z coordinates of this Point in Cartesian space
toDegrees()¶

Create a copy of this Point converted to degrees

Returns:model.Point–A converted Point copy
toRadians()¶

Create a copy of this Point converted to radians

Returns:model.Point–A converted Point copy
west(distance)¶

Create a Point at the specified distance due west of this Point

Parameters:distance (float) – Distance in meters
Returns:model.Point – A Point west of this point
class routesimulation.model.Trip(points)¶

A sequence of model.Point s

Parameters:points (list) – An ordered list of model.Point s
